Class SslConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.micronaut.http.ssl.SslConfiguration
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Toggleable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ClientSslConfiguration, DefaultSslConfiguration, ServerSslConfiguration, ServiceHttpClientConfiguration.ServiceSslClientConfiguration

    public class SslConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object
implements Toggleable
    Configuration properties for SSL handling.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    James Kleeh
